column1: Smoque BBQ////My fiance took me to Smoque the other evening so I could try the food he wants catered for our wedding.  We're still debating about Smoque catering our wedding
column2: but I'm totally open to the rehersal dinner.  The BBQ was AMAZING!  He and I split a plate of the pulled pork with 2 sides and it filled both of us up no problem.
